entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:46 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:46 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 5:46 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
